## valueDerivation variable

Returns a derivation of the value at the provided pointer. Derivations are cached per pointer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
valueDerivation: <P extends PointerType<any>>(pointer: P) => IDerivation<P extends PointerType<infer T> ? T : void>
```
